verses.text: \w James|strong="G2385"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w servant|strong="G1401"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w tribes|strong="G5443"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w scattered|strong="G1290"\w* \w abroad|strong="G1290"\w*, \w greeting|strong="G5463"\w*.

\w My|strong="G3956"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w count|strong="G2233"\w* \w it|strong="G2233"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w*, \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w you|strong="G3752"\w* shall fall into divers temptations;

\w Knowing|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* trying \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w your|strong="G4102"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* worketh \w patience|strong="G5281"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w* hath \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G1722"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* entire, failing \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* want \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*, let \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w ask|strong="G0154"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* giveth \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G3956"\w* abundantly, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* upbraideth \w not|strong="G3361"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* let \w him|strong="G2532"\w* \w ask|strong="G0154"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w* wavering. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1161"\w* wavereth \w is|strong="G3588"\w* like \w a|strong="G2532"\w* wave \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* moved \w and|strong="G2532"\w* carried \w about|strong="G1722"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w wind|strong="G4494"\w*.

Therefore let \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* think \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w shall|strong="G0444"\w* \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* thing \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.
\w A|strong="G0435"\w* double minded \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* inconstant \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w ways|strong="G3598"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* let \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* low condition \w glory|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* exaltation:

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w rich|strong="G4145"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* being low; \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w flower|strong="G0438"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w grass|strong="G5528"\w* shall \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w pass|strong="G3928"\w* \w away|strong="G3928"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w sun|strong="G2246"\w* rose \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G3779"\w* burning \w heat|strong="G2742"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* parched \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w grass|strong="G5528"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w flower|strong="G0438"\w* thereof fell off, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w beauty|strong="G2143"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* shape thereof \w perished|strong="G0622"\w*: \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w rich|strong="G4145"\w* \w man|strong="G4145"\w* \w fade|strong="G3133"\w* \w away|strong="G3583"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* ways.

\w Blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \w is|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* endureth \w temptation|strong="G3986"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w when|strong="G1096"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* hath \w been|strong="G1096"\w* \w proved|strong="G1096"\w*, \w he|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* \w of|strong="G0435"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G0846"\w* hath \w promised|strong="G1861"\w* \w to|strong="G1096"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w man|strong="G3762"\w*, \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w tempted|strong="G3985"\w*, \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w tempted|strong="G3985"\w* \w by|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3367"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w tempter|strong="G3985"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w evils|strong="G2556"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* tempteth \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w man|strong="G3762"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w tempted|strong="G3985"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* concupiscence, being drawn \w away|strong="G1828"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* allured.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* concupiscence hath \w conceived|strong="G4815"\w*, \w it|strong="G1161"\w* bringeth \w forth|strong="G0616"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w it|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* completed, begetteth \w death|strong="G2288"\w*.
\w Do|strong="G3361"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* err, therefore, \w my|strong="G4105"\w* dearest \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*.

\w Every|strong="G3956"\w* best \w gift|strong="G1434"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w* \w gift|strong="G1434"\w*, \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w above|strong="G0509"\w*, \w coming|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w lights|strong="G5457"\w*, \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* change, \w nor|strong="G2532"\w* \w shadow|strong="G0644"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* alteration.

\w For|strong="G1519"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* hath \w he|strong="G0846"\w* begotten \w us|strong="G1519"\w* \w by|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w might|strong="G5100"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* beginning \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w creatures|strong="G2938"\w*.

\w You|strong="G1510"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w*, \w my|strong="G0191"\w* dearest \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w let|strong="G1510"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* swift \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w slow|strong="G1021"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w slow|strong="G1021"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w anger|strong="G3709"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G2316"\w* \w anger|strong="G3709"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* worketh \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G2316"\w* \w justice|strong="G1343"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* casting away \w all|strong="G3956"\w* uncleanness, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w abundance|strong="G4050"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* naughtiness, \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w meekness|strong="G4240"\w* \w receive|strong="G1209"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* ingrafted \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w able|strong="G1410"\w* \w to|strong="G1410"\w* \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w souls|strong="G5590"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* ye \w doers|strong="G4163"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w hearers|strong="G0202"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, deceiving \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w own|strong="G1438"\w* selves.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w hearer|strong="G0202"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w doer|strong="G4163"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w compared|strong="G1510"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* beholding \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w own|strong="G0846"\w* countenance \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* glass.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* beheld \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G0565"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w way|strong="G0565"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* presently forgot \w what|strong="G3697"\w* manner \w of|strong="G2532"\w* man \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* hath \w looked|strong="G1096"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w liberty|strong="G1657"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath continued therein, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w becoming|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w forgetful|strong="G1953"\w* \w hearer|strong="G0202"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w doer|strong="G4163"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*; \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w deed|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w And|strong="G0846"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w think|strong="G1380"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G5100"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w religious|strong="G2357"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* bridling \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* deceiving \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man’s|strong="G5100"\w* \w religion|strong="G2356"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w vain|strong="G3152"\w*.

\w Religion|strong="G2356"\w* \w clean|strong="G2513"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w undefiled|strong="G0283"\w* \w before|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*: \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w visit|strong="G1980"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* fatherless \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w widows|strong="G5503"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w tribulation|strong="G2347"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* \w one’s|strong="G0846"\w* self unspotted \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.
